editorialNotes.standard: This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivalsâ€™ property, and rake in profits.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tons of fun on one screen

editorialNotes.standard: We love chilling withÂ friends in this classic card gameâ€™s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.

Hipster Whale's Apple Design Awardâ€“winning game takes a timeless arcade formulaâ€”cross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstaclesâ€”and transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, youâ€™ll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. Thereâ€™s a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other gamesâ€”like Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Roadâ€™s wacky world are unmistakable.

editorialNotes.tagline: Start a new life in the country
editorialNotes.standard: Running a farm is hard and often thankless workâ€”unless that farm happens to be an adorable piece of virtual land overseen by a helpful, chatty scarecrow. Swiping across plots of land to harvest crops, feed livestock and manufacture goods is pleasantly relaxing, and growing your tiny farm into a booming business is a hugely satisfying achievement. Silly characters, cute critters and a variety of things to plant, reap, build and sell make Hay Day easy to pick up and tough to put down.

Ancient Egyptians loved cats, Metallica hasnâ€™t played the Super Bowl, and the Ganges is Indiaâ€™s largest riverâ€”all our useless knowledge is now coming in handy thanks to Trivia Crack. This bite-sized trivia game is totally irresistible, whether weâ€™re dominating our Facebook friends in classic mode, trouncing strangers in the 12-question challenge mode, or just sneaking in a game on our Apple Watch. With its cute characters, heaps of unlockable achievements, and a massive variety of questions, we simply canâ€™t get enough.

editorialNotes.short: Costumes and special events are waiting for you.

name: How Well Do You Know Me?

editorialNotes.standard: The makers of Heads Up! have delivered another incredible party game, perfect for almost any crowd. It blends trivia and bluffing for maximum hilarity, challenging everyone in the room to craft an answer to each question. Then these options are paired with the correct one, and players have to pick which they think is right. Can you trick people with a believable response? Or would you rather crack them up with outrageous nonsense? Either way, a great time is guaranteed.

editorialNotes.standard: The only way is up in this pixel-perfect construction caper. Raise new floors, run businesses, and manage your residents as you transform your tiny tower from its humble beginings as a multi-story mishmash into a stratospheric skyscraper. Make sure to keep an eye on your citizensâ€™ social media statuses, skills and ambitions to match them to their dream jobs.
